display_long_description:
“The Cabin offers some of the most enjoyable and intense short-session action currently available on the Quest “ - 6DOF 

Locked in a creepy Cabin deep in the woods, you must rely on your wits and survival skills to gather supplies, arm yourself to the teeth, and fend off hordes of gruesome proto-zombie creatures. 

[media]

**✔ Play alone or co-op**

Brave enough to take on the challenge alone? Or bring a friend along for the ride!

[media]

**✔ Endless Hordes**

Can you handle the intense action of 15+ zombies on screen at any given time? Stay alert and use every tool at your disposal to survive.

[media]

**✔ Scavenge for Resources**

Search high and low for ammo, weapons, and other objects that can give you an edge in the battle against the undead. Be careful with your resource management, as every bullet counts.

**✔ Gear up**

Customize your loadout with a wide range of firearms, melee weapons, and other tools to suit your playstyle.

**✔ Power Up**

Level up your player and unlock a range of powerful perks that will give you an edge in combat, including deadly weapon upgrades like the laser scope for sniper precision accuracy.

**✔ Unlock New Areas**

Unlock lots of new zones outside of the Cabin area that will test your skills in new and exciting ways.

**✔ Climb the Leaderboards**

Climb the leaderboards and show off your skills to the world.

**✔ Home Invasion**

Turn your real-world space into a creepy Cabin with the FREE award winning Home Invasion Mixed Reality game mode.

[media]

Do you have what it takes to survive The Cabin? 

**Discord: Soulassembly.com/cabin**
